rationale: In developing nations demand of consumer electronic appliances is increasing day by day. This requires large number of technically trained men power in relevant industries. Equipments with electronic circuitry are increasingly being used in all the Industry and maintenance of them is the essential work for the proper functioning of the complete system. Looking towards the need of the country, in-depth knowledge for maintaining various electronics audio-video systems and home appliances is necessary for diploma engineering students. This subject will introduce the students with working principles, block diagram and advance features of consumer electronics appliances, which in-turn will develop skills to diagnosis fault and rectification of that in systematic way. This course will enable the students to develop skills to maintain the basic electronic circuitry used in the equipments, which are employed in Industry and in consumer goods segments.
competency: The purpose of this course is to help the student to attain the following industry identified competency through various teaching learning experiences: Maintain and troubleshoot various consumer electronic domestic/office appliances.

courseOutcomes.description: Test working of various colour TV
Describe functionality of various electronic domestic appliances
Describe functionality of various electronic office appliances
Follow standard maintenance procedures to maintain various domestic and office appliances

practicalExercises.description: Measure audio intensity level with the help of suitable audio level meter
Build Test 2 channel audio power amplifiers
Operate digital TV trailer kit and observe wave form
Verify the performance of LED TVs. Compare performance parameters of at least three brands
Install and verify the performance Direct to Home (DTH) receiver
Test various functions of microwave oven
Explore the various functions of automatic washing machine and locate various electronic sensors used in that washing machine
Check the wiring of Air Conditioner and explore all the functions
Build solar powered DC power supply and verify its performance
Demonstrate installation of solar power system and verify its performance
Demonstrate installation of CCTV camera system and verify its performance
Draw the regulated power supply circuit and test voltage at various points of SMPS of any digital television, microwave oven, refrigerator, air-conditioner, MF printer, projector, photo copier etc
Installation of MF printer and test various functions of printer
Installation of any LCD/LED projector and test its various function
Test the performance of different active and passive electronic components separately and mounted on PCB
Demonstrate the steps of maintenance and troubleshooting of any domestic / office appliance

performanceIndicators.indicator: Operate the equipment setup or circuit

hardware: Soldering iron 25 W, 240 V with solder materials
software: Multisim for Analog and Electronics Circuit design and simulation

affectiveDomainOutcomes: Work as a leader/a team member

unitOutcomes.description: Describe the fundamental audio signal characteristics: Sound intensity, Pitch, Fidelity and Loudness
Describe operating principles of different types of microphones
Describe operating principles of different types of loud speakers
Explain optical sound recording process
Describe the working of public address (PA) system, home theatre system

topics.title: Audio level metering, decibel level in acoustic measurement
Microphone: working principle, sensitivity, nature of response, directional characteristics
Loud speaker: working principle, characteristic impedance, watt capacity
Home theatre sound system, surround sound

unitOutcomes.description: Differentiate between hue, brightness, saturation, luminance and chrominance, Colour TV standards
Describe functioning of colour TV receiver with the help of block diagram
Describe the function of given section of PAL-D decoder
Explain working of digital TV
Describe the functioning of Direct to Home (DTH) receiver

topics.title: Block diagram and operation of colour TV receiver

Direct to Home (DTH) receiver

unitOutcomes.description: Explain working of Microwave oven and specification
Describe working of Washing machine
Describe the working of Air conditioner and Refrigerator
Describe the working and installation of solar power system with its specification

unitOutcomes.description: Describe the types of maintenance
Describe the maintenance and troubleshooting procedure of audio systems
Describe the troubleshooting procedure of typical TV receivers
Describe the maintenance and troubleshooting procedure of home appliances
Describe the troubleshooting procedure of office appliances

topics.title: Maintenance and troubleshooting of Audio systems
Maintenance and troubleshooting of Digital TV
Maintenance and Troubleshooting procedure of home appliance
Maintenance and Troubleshooting procedure of office appliances

studentActivities: Troubleshoot the common consumer electronics products like digital TV, Washing machine, microwave oven, refrigerator, MF printer, Air conditioner etc.
Conduct market survey for latest home appliances and compare specifications of reputed brands and prepare a report.
Diagnose fault in the non working home appliance and rectify that.
Discuss case study of any fault detection and rectification problem.
Make visit to service centers of gadgets/equipment covered in curriculum and if possible work there for some days on voluntarily basis during holidays.

Search internet websites for DYS (Do Your Self) information for repair of electronic gadgets/equipment or collect manuals for repair and maintenance and try your hands to repair some gadgets/equipment based on that.
instructionalStrategies: Arrange demonstration sessions of maintaining equipment/gadgets in labs by inviting engineers/technicians working in service centers of reputed makes as visiting lecturers for lab sessions
Show video/animation films to demonstrate the working principles, constructional features, testing and maintenance procedures of various home appliances.
Show video/animation film explaining different field applications of PLC, DCS and SCADA.
Prepare a chart related to PLC, DCS and SCADA Hierarchy
Arrange a visit to nearby manufacturer of consumer electronics products.
Arrange visit to repair centers of reputed makes of consumer goods suppliers.
Implement value addition circuits for the consumer electronic product based on Innovative ideas.
Arrange group discussions on the troubleshooting of electronic equipment issues.
Arrange seminar on safety and maintenance issues (ask students to explore the internet and visit nearby industries to collect information regarding the chosen topic/issue)

microProjects.title: Build a circuit for continuity tester with buzzer and LED indicator
microProjects.description: Design and build a continuity testing circuit with visual and audio indicators

microProjects.title: Build a circuit of DC voltage regulator on general purpose PCB
microProjects.description: Design and construct a DC voltage regulation circuit on PCB

microProjects.title: Trace the circuit of DC power supply, create faults in diodes, resistor, capacitor, voltage regulator IC etc and diagnose the faults and rectify it
microProjects.description: Practice fault diagnosis and troubleshooting techniques on DC power supply circuits

microProjects.title: Prepare reports on operation and maintenance of photovoltaic and Energy Storage Systems
microProjects.description: Research and document solar power system operation and maintenance procedures

microProjects.title: Prepare reports on operation and maintenance of microwave oven
microProjects.description: Study and document microwave oven working principles and maintenance

microProjects.title: Prepare testing charts of active components like diode, transistor, SCR, TRIAC etc
microProjects.description: Create comprehensive testing procedures and charts for electronic components

programOutcomes.description: Basic & Discipline specific knowledge: Apply knowledge of basic mathematics, science and engineering fundamentals and engineering specialization to solve the engineering problems
Problem Analysis: Identify and analyze well defined engineering problems using codified standard methods
Design/ Development of Solution: Design solutions for well-defined technical problems and assist with the design of systems, components or processes to meet specified needs
Engineering Tools, Experimentation & Testing: Apply modern engineering tools and relevant technique to conduct standard tests and measurements
Engineering practices for society, sustainability & environment: Apply relevant technology in context of society, sustainability, environment and ethical practices
Project Management: Use engineering management principles individually, as a team member or a leader to manage projects and effectively communicate about well-defined engineering activities
Life-long learning: Ability to analyze individual needs and engage in updating in the context of technological changes
